testcase.classname: Check whether the lead page is working properly
testcase.name: Check whether we can create a new lead
testcase.system-out: Given open the browser and enter the url....................................passed When Enter valid username and password for login............................passed Then Check page redirect to home page.......................................passed Then Select Sales icon from left navigation and check the page is displaying lead list page.passed Then Click Add Lead button and check the page redirected into corresponding page.passed Then Enter the values in all the fields and save the record.................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
